Keys.Name: offHandKeyString
Keys.Description: Off-Hand Key: Accepts Mouse/Button input using the string value (Mouse0 - left click mouse | Mouse1 - Right click mouse | Mouse2 - Center click mouse | Ect.

Keys.Name: PhysicalWeapons
Keys.Description: Weapons have actual hit arcs and will bounce off physical objects when hit.

Keys.Name: toggleAttackIndicator
Keys.Description: Toggles on and off the attack indicator

Keys.Name: BucklerMechanics
Keys.Description: Buckler Mechanics: Turns on or off the unique buckler mechanics and associated animation code. Off will default it to the standard shield hold mothod for those who prefer it.

Keys.Name: BlockTimeMod
Keys.Description: Block Time Modifier: Mutiplies your block time by the amount to modify the end time/value.

Keys.Name: BlockCostMod
Keys.Description: Block Cost Modifier: Mutiplies your block fatigue cost by the amount to modify the end time/value.

Sections.Name: AttackSettings
Sections.Description: Adjust the attack settings. DO NOT ENABLE WHEN USING DRAG ATTACKING!

Keys.Name: MovementAttacking
Keys.Description: Use movement keys to choose attack direction (Cannot do downleft/downright attacks)

Keys.Name: LookDirectionAttacking
Keys.Description: Use mouse look direction (not dragging) to pick attack direction. Can be used with movement based attacking too.

Keys.Name: LookDirectionAttackThreshold
Keys.Description: How quickly looking a direction will update you attack direction.

Sections.Name: IndicatorSettings
Sections.Description: Adjust the attack indicator settings here. Used to customize size and positioning. Will allow custom indicators in future.

Keys.Name: IndicatorSize
Keys.Description: The size of the attack indicator

Sections.Name: AnimationSettings
Sections.Description: Choose how you want animations to work.

Keys.Name: ClassicAnimations
Keys.Description: Classic Animations: Turn on or off classic animation look. If you feel smooth animations are to out of place, use this.

Keys.Name: ToggleBob
Keys.Description: Toggle Bob: Turns on or off the walking bob animation.

Keys.Name: AttackPrimerTime
Keys.Description: How long of a delay, in seconds, before you begin a new attack combo once stopping your last combo/attack. During this time window, you can initiate a parry. Default 0.16S.

Sections.Name: WeaponSettings
Sections.Description: Choose your weapon settings, like reach.
